name: Akangsha Shah
headline: Customer-Focused Professional | Marketing & HR Postgraduate Student
about: Reliable, customer-focused professional with experience in fast-paced retail and fulfillment environments. Skilled in client engagement, issue resolution, transaction processing, and team collaboration. Currently pursuing postgraduate studies in Marketing and HR. Seeking a part-time Customer Service position where I can contribute to enhancing customer satisfaction, promoting brand loyalty, and ensuring seamless store operations.

education.degree: Postgraduate Certificate in Human Resources Management

education.institution: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University, Surat, India

experience.title: Fulfillment Associate
description: Delivered fast, accurate order processing and packaging to ensure timely and error-free shipping.
Assisted with inbound receiving, labeling, scanning, and product organization to improve workflow efficiency.
Operated warehouse equipment safely and adhered to all OSHA and company safety standards.
Collaborated with team members to meet KPIs for order volume, speed, and accuracy.

experience.title: Human Resources Assistant
description: Supported employee lifecycle functions including onboarding, training, and file management.
Acted as a point of contact for employee inquiries and helped resolve basic HR and workplace issues.
Scheduled interviews, coordinated meetings, and maintained compliance documentation.
Handled confidential employee records and ensured accurate data entry in HR systems.

projects.title: Customer Experience Simulation
projects.description: Simulated frontline support role and resolved 50+ mock customer queries using scripts, empathy techniques, and CRM software as part of training program.

projects.title: Retail Service Optimization
projects.description: Designed a mock retail customer journey using marketing and HR analytics to identify service bottlenecks and propose loyalty-enhancing strategies.

extraCurricular: Volunteered at college career events assisting with attendee coordination and feedback collection.
Participated in group marketing projects focused on customer psychology and service quality.
leadership: Mentored new employees at Amazon by helping them understand safety guidelines and operational procedures.
Coordinated small teams for academic presentations, demonstrating initiative and organizational skills.
